1391: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
The reality distortion formed by Honkai will disturb natural phenomena, and then distort some concepts, while space distortion is only part of it.
由崩坏形成的现实扭曲立场会造成自然现象的混乱，从而对一些概念进行扭曲，而空间扭曲只是其中的一种表现。
崩壊によって形成された現実歪曲フィールドは自然現象の乱れをもたらし、一部の概念に歪みを引き起こすの。空間の歪みも、その中のひとつよ。
붕괴로 형성된 현실 왜곡 필드는 자연 현상의 혼란을 가져오고, 일부 개념에 왜곡을 일으키는 거야. 공간의 왜곡도 그중 하나지.
The distorted position of reality formed by the collapse can cause confusion in natural phenomena, thus distorting some concepts, of which space distortion is only one manifestation.
The reality distortion field formed by the collapse causes disturbances in natural phenomena and distortions in some concepts. Spatial distortion is one of them.
